RTCIceCandidatePairStatsLocalCandidateId.summary:
The property
localCandidateId is a string that uniquely identifies
the local ICE candidate which was analyzed to generate the
used to compute the statistics for this pair of
candidates.

A string giving a unique identifier for the local
for the connection described by this
RTCIceCandidatePairStats object.This candidate is the source of one of the two
objects that were used to compute the contents of this
object.
